items.long_desc: An official document that grants one the ability to call upon law enforcement
A map owned by the pirates that details the surrounding area. Steve's hideout is marked.
A somewhat worn handbook that details the basics of sailing.
A pristine handbook that details the basics of interrogation.
A shining, elegant sword imbued with magic power. Vague runes can be seen on the side, remnants of a lost age.
A photo book containing pictures from Steve's infancy. The shame is sure to wound him more than any blade.
The knife is worn, but of good quality and free of rust.
